showScoreExcerpt:
"There is genuine desperation in these characters that is relatable for anyone who has struggled against odds. And each cares what the other two think of him. There are attempts at deception laced heavily with guilt and the ache of having to believe in something just enough to not die without hope or at least some entertainment. We are entertained as every nugget of humor is squeezed out of the writing."

Read more
